scripts.build: npm run clear-build-directory && npm run copy-static-files && npm run scss && npm run js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-static-files & npm run watch-scss & npm run watch-js
scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css
scripts.watch-static-files: nodemon -w src -i app/* -i scss/* -e html,css,scss,js,ttf,ico,jpg,png,svg -x "npm run copy-static-files"
scripts.build-native: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir
scripts.build-native-win: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --x64 --ia32 --win nsis zip --publish never
scripts.build-native-mac: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --publish never
scripts.build-native-linux: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --x64 --linux appImage deb tar.gz --publish never

scripts.build-gitlab-mac: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --x64 --mac zip --publish never
scripts.build-gitlab-linux: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --dir --x64 --linux appImage deb tar.gz --publish never
scripts.publish-native-win: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --win --publish always
scripts.publish-native-mac: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.publish-native-linux: npm run build && node ./native-build-scripts/01-copy-files.js && cd temp && npm install --no-audit --production && cd .. && electron-builder --publish always
